title: The Collective Season One Finale
description: The Collective is…HERE!Are you ready to find out what all the buzz is about?We’ve set the stage, created the characters, and fashioned a world full of twists and turns. Now it’s your turn to sit back and immerse yourself in this incredible series. Each episode weaves the characters and storylines of our standalone novels together to give you an epic crossover series.We’ve left you breadcrumbs, tidbits of information intertwined throughout our stories. Can you find them? Can you collect the clues we’ve left and become part of The Collective and solve the case?No one is safe as a killer goes on a killing spree. Will The Collective stop him in time? Will you?Featured authors in order of appearance-Riley EdwardsErin TrejoEllie MastersElias RavenChris GenoveseCarver Pike.
author: Ellie Masters
